snippet.title: NIER The World of Recycled Vessel [DLC]
snippet.description:
DRAKENGARD 1 THE MOVIE
THE MOVIE: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EkmtlWhn_20
DRAKENGARD 2 THE MOVIE
THE MOVIE: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jMjKkGl18Nc
DRAKENGARD 3 THE MOVIE:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7eUSiPgb2wE
NIER AUTOMATA THE MOVIE:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g_duPpZ_99A

NIER The World of Recycled Vessel [DLC]

Movie in progress.

A sequel to Drakengard 1 series E Ending. This was my first game of the series that I have played, but I couldn't see anything related to the Drakengard 1 series during this other than a few lines that have been dropped and needed to be Googled.

Compare to the Drakengard series, this game gives you freedom to actually explore different areas back and forth instead of completing missions A to B with the same boring layout.

Problem is clunky combat.
